title: Eddy Merckx racing bike, Rh 54, carbon
description:
The bike is in perfect technical condition. It has a carbon fork. It has clear signs of wear, which can be seen in the pictures.

The front and rear wheels were recently fitted with new tires from Continental.

I'm 1.79 meters tall and was able to ride it well, but I wouldn't recommend it to taller people.

The bike is not sold with the pedals as in the photo, it is sold with standard pedals.

Bicycles can of course be test ridden by arrangement.
